name: Strip President of Tendoryu / Kinetic Strip Party
name_original: Strip President of Tendoryu / Kinetic Strip Party
description:
Feley, the protagonist made her new home in Tendoryu, a city of tentacle monsters. While tentacle monsters never touch her for a certain reason, she still feels awkward when seeing them having their way with other girls in her daily life. And though she never tells anyone, her friends notice that and want to help her relieve her desire inside. Feley strongly refuse, and her friends do not back down either, the conflict happens and they decide to solve it all with a popular game in Tendoryu.

That is the story mode, but there is also a free mode where girls just play strip game together in the evening.

Features


- Card game.
- Female only characters/Scenes
- 5 girls to pick/play with.
- Special rules.
- Special abilities.
- Story mode.

Controls


- LeftClick : Select card.
- RightClick : Move card selecter.
- Mouse wheel : Choose number of cards you want to play.
- S : Activate abilities.

Visit us on discord.
https://discord.gg/Xav4U7d
